location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: Enclosures to Despatch to the Secret Committee Nos. 18-20, dated 17 November - 20 December 1837.A note on folio 314 states 'Enclosures to Secret Letters nos. 18-20 dated 17th November to 20th December, are not in this Collection'.The only item present is an Abstract of Contents of Despatch to the Secret Committee No. 19, dated 17 November 1837, describing the contents of four letters between the Resident at Catmandhoo [Kathmandu] and the Government of India, concerning the affairs of Nepaul [Nepal].
